https://tmrev.io/movie/5559-Bee Movie 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/aWe27GmvfVYAd7p0KEtJZWwLWk5.jpg Barry B. Benson, a bee who has just graduated from college, is disillusioned at his lone career choice: making honey. On a special trip outside the hive, Barry's life is saved by Vanessa, a florist in New York City. As their relationship blossoms, he discovers humans actually eat honey, and subsequently decides to sue us. Bee Movie
